==Events==
*[[1400]] &ndash; The [[Trần Dynasty]] of [[Vietnam]] is deposed after one hundred and seventy-five years of rule by [[Hồ Quý Ly]], a court official.
*[[1540]] &ndash; [[Waltham Abbey Church|Waltham Abbey]] is surrendered to King [[Henry VIII of England]]; the last religious community to be closed during the [[Dissolution of the Monasteries]].
*[[1568]] &ndash; The [[Peace of Longjumeau]] is signed, ending the second phase of the [[French Wars of Religion]].
*[[1708]] &ndash; [[James Francis Edward Stuart]] lands at the [[Firth of Forth]].
*[[1757]] &ndash; Capture of [[Chandannagar]] fort by [[United Kingdom|British]] forces.
*[[1775]] &ndash; [[American Revolutionary War]]: [[Patrick Henry]] delivers his speech &ndash; "[[Give me Liberty, or give me Death!]]" &ndash; at [[St. John's Episcopal Church, Richmond, Virginia]].
*[[1801]] &ndash; [[Tsar]] [[Paul I of Russia]] is struck with a sword, then [[strangle]]d, and finally trampled to death inside his bedroom at [[St. Michael's Castle]].
*[[1806]] &ndash; After traveling through the [[Louisiana Purchase]] and reaching the [[Pacific Ocean]], explorers [[Lewis and Clark]] and their "[[Corps of Discovery]]" begin their arduous journey home.
*[[1821]] &ndash; [[Greek War of Independence]]: Battle and fall of city of [[Kalamata]].
*[[1848]] &ndash; The ship ''[[John Wickliffe (ship)|John Wickliffe]]'' arrives at [[Port Chalmers]] carrying the first [[Scotland|Scottish]] settlers for [[Dunedin, New Zealand|Dunedin]], [[New Zealand]]. [[Otago]] province is founded.
*[[1857]] &ndash; [[Elisha Otis]]'s first [[elevator]] is installed at 488 [[Broadway (Manhattan)|Broadway]] [[New York City]].
*[[1862]] &ndash; The [[First Battle of Kernstown]], Virginia, marks the start of Stonewall Jackson's Valley Campaign.  Though a Confederate defeat, the engagement distracts Federal efforts to capture Richmond.
*[[1868]] &ndash; The [[University of California]] is founded in [[Oakland, California]] when the Organic Act is signed into law.
*[[1879]] &ndash; [[War of the Pacific]]: The [[Battle of Topáter]], the first battle of the war is fought between [[Chile]] and the joint forces of [[Bolivia]] and [[Peru]].
*[[1885]] &ndash; [[Sino-French War]]: Chinese victory in the [[Battle of Phu Lam Tao]] near Hung Hoa, northern [[Vietnam]].
*[[1888]] &ndash; In England, [[The Football League]], the world's oldest professional [[Association Football]] league, meets for the first time.
*[[1889]] &ndash; The [[Ahmadiyya]] Muslim Community is established by [[Mirza Ghulam Ahmad]] in [[Qadian]],  [[India]].
*[[1901]] &ndash; [[Emilio Aguinaldo]], only President of the [[First Philippine Republic]], was captured at [[Palanan, Isabela]] by forces of General [[Frederick Funston]].
*[[1905]] &ndash; [[Eleftherios Venizelos]] calls for [[Crete]]'s union with [[Greece]], and begins what is to be known as the [[Theriso revolt]].
*[[1908]] &ndash; American diplomat [[Durham Stevens]] is attacked by [[Korea]]n assassins [[Jeon Myeong-un]] and [[Jang In-hwan]], leading to his death in a hospital two days later.
*[[1909]] &ndash; [[Theodore Roosevelt]] leaves [[New York]] for a post-[[presidency]] [[safari]] in [[Africa]]. The trip is sponsored by the [[Smithsonian Institution]] and [[National Geographic Society]].
*[[1918]] &ndash; [[First World War]]: On the third day of the German [[Operation Michael|Spring Offensive]], the 10th Battalion of the [[Royal West Kent Regiment]] is annihilated with many of the men becoming [[Prisoners of war]]
*[[1919]] &ndash; In [[Milan]], [[Italy]], [[Benito Mussolini]] founds his [[Italian Fascism|Fascist]] political movement.
*[[1931]] &ndash; [[Bhagat Singh]], [[Shivaram Rajguru]] and [[Sukhdev Thapar]] are hanged for murder during the [[India]]n struggle for independence.
*[[1933]] &ndash; The ''[[Reichstag (Weimar Republic)|Reichstag]]'' passes the [[Enabling Act of 1933]], making [[Adolf Hitler]] [[dictator]] of [[Germany]].
*[[1935]] &ndash; Signing of the [[Constitution of the Philippines#Commonwealth and Third Republic|Constitution]] of the Commonwealth of the [[Philippines]].
*[[1939]] &ndash; The [[Kingdom of Hungary (Regency)|Hungarian]] air force attacks the headquarters of [[Slovenské vzdušné zbrane|Slovak air force]] in the city of [[Spišská Nová Ves]], kills 13 people and began the [[Slovak–Hungarian War]].
*[[1940]] &ndash; The [[Lahore Resolution]] ([[Qarardad-e-Pakistan]] or the then [[Qarardad-e-Lahore]]) is put forward at the Annual General Convention of the [[All India Muslim League]].
*[[1942]] &ndash; [[World War II]]: In the [[Indian Ocean]], [[Japan]]ese forces capture the [[Andaman Islands]].
*[[1956]] &ndash; [[Pakistan]] becomes the first [[Islamic republic]] in the world. ([[Republic Day#March 23rd in Pakistan|Republic Day]] in Pakistan)
*[[1965]] &ndash; [[NASA]] launches [[Gemini 3]], the [[United States]]' first two-man space flight (crew: [[Gus Grissom]] and [[John Young (astronaut)|John Young]]).
*  1965  &ndash; The first issue of ''[[The Vigilant]]'' is published from [[Khartoum]].
*[[1978]] &ndash; The first [[UNIFIL]] troops arrived in [[Lebanon]] for [[Timeline of UN peacekeeping missions|peacekeeping mission]] along the [[Blue Line (Lebanon)|Blue Line]].
*[[1980]] &ndash; Archbishop [[Óscar Romero]] of [[El Salvador]] gives his famous speech appealing to men of the El Salvadoran armed forces to stop killing the Salvadorans.
*[[1982]] &ndash; [[Guatemala]]'s government, headed by [[Fernando Romeo Lucas García]] is overthrown in a military coup by right-wing General [[Efraín Ríos Montt]].
*[[1983]] &ndash; [[Strategic Defense Initiative]]: President [[Ronald Reagan]] makes his initial proposal to develop technology to intercept enemy missiles.
*[[1989]] &ndash; [[Stanley Pons]] and [[Martin Fleischmann]] announce their discovery of [[cold fusion]] at the [[University of Utah]].
*[[1991]] &ndash; The [[Revolutionary United Front]], with support from the special forces of [[Charles Taylor (Liberia)|Charles Taylor]]'s [[National Patriotic Front of Liberia]], invades [[Sierra Leone]] in an attempt to overthrow [[Joseph Saidu Momoh]], sparking a gruesome 11-year [[Sierra Leone Civil War]].
*[[1994]] &ndash; At an election rally in [[Tijuana]], [[Mexico|Mexican]] presidential candidate [[Luis Donaldo Colosio]] is assassinated by [[Mario Aburto Martínez]].
*  1994   &ndash; [[Aeroflot Flight 593]] crashes in [[Siberia]] when the [[aviator|pilot]]'s fifteen-year old son accidentally disengages the [[autopilot]], killing all 75 people on board.
*  1994   &ndash; A [[United States Air Force]] (USAF) [[F-16 Fighting Falcon|F-16]] aircraft collides with a USAF [[C-130 Hercules|C-130]] at [[Pope Air Force Base]] and then crashes, killing 24 [[United States Army]] soldiers on the ground. This later became known as the [[Green Ramp disaster]].
*[[1996]] &ndash; [[Taiwan]] holds its [[ROC Presidential Election 1996|first direct elections]] and chooses [[Lee Teng-hui]] as [[President of the Republic of China|President]].
*[[1999]] &ndash; Gunmen assassinate [[Paraguay]]'s [[Vice President]] [[Luis María Argaña]].
*[[2001]] &ndash; The [[Russia]]n ''[[Mir]]'' space station is [[Deorbit of Mir|disposed of]], breaking up in the atmosphere before falling into the southern [[Pacific Ocean]] near [[Fiji]].
*[[2003]] &ndash; [[Battle of Nasiriyah]], first major conflict during the [[2003 invasion of Iraq|invasion of Iraq]].
*[[2005]] &ndash; [[Texas City Refinery explosion]]: During a test on a distillation tower liquid waste builds up and flows out of a blowout tower. Waste fumes ignite and explode killing 15 workers.
*[[2009]] &ndash; [[FedEx Express Flight 80]]: A [[McDonnell Douglas]] [[MD-11]] flying from [[Guangzhou]], China crashes at [[Tokyo]]'s [[Narita International Airport]], killing both the captain and the co-pilot.
